name: Firefox Browser UI Kit
description:
This is the older version of Firefox, download the new version of UI Kit here.


Introducing an unofficial Firefox Browser UI Kit for Figma.


This kit will help you to:

  • Supercharge your presentation.
  • A great file to start designing Firefox theme or you want to improve Firefox browser design.


This mockup features:

  • 100% desktop browser and mobile browser mockups with vector shapes and fully editable URLs and favicon.
  • Fully resizable and reusable as a component library.
  • Support Figma auto layout.


---


Version History:

• 1.0.6: Fix things and organize components

• 1.0.5: Added mobile version light theme

• 1.0.0: Added desktop version light and black theme
